data.lyric:
[ti:Gone Too Soon]
[ar:Andrew Jannakos]
[al:Gone Too Soon]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Gone Too Soon - Andrew Jannakos
[00:07.84]Composed by：Jason Afable/Joshua Clements Bricker/Andrew Paul Jannakos
[00:15.68]Every night at 12 o'clock
[00:18.51]On the dot it never fails you call me up
[00:22.50]Talking 'bout you had a bad day
[00:24.01]So you're pulling up
[00:26.08]So I pour up a cup of just what you need
[00:29.10]Cause I know what you need
[00:33.22]I love it when you wanna sleep at my place
[00:37.17]I love it when we dancing down the hallway
[00:41.16]But when you leave it puts me in a bad place
[00:45.22]Will you stay come on please stay
[00:49.00]You come around unannounced and you leave with the sunlight
[00:53.06]Just when it's getting good you hit me with that goodbye
[00:56.95]Same thing every night I can never get enough time
[01:01.05]I want more of ya
[01:03.08]I want more of that moonlight that candlelight that red wine
[01:07.26]That's gone too soon
[01:08.31]Your silhouette your fingertips your lingering
[01:11.35]You ain't going nowhere
[01:14.24]My t-shirt you're still in it
[01:16.33]Been on your phone for a minute
[01:18.55]Baby who you kidding
[01:20.97]Girl we're running running running running from the truth
[01:24.97]I know you want me to so why do you
[01:29.00]You come around unannounced and you leave with the sunlight
[01:32.98]Just when it's getting good you hit me with that goodbye
[01:36.89]Same thing every night I can never get enough time
[01:40.98]I want more of ya
[01:42.97]I want more of that moonlight that candlelight that red wine
[01:47.28]That's gone too soon
[01:50.43]Yeah it's gone too soon
[01:55.34]It's gone too soon
[02:01.02]Girl we're running running running running from the truth
[02:05.36]But we don't have to so you don't have to
[02:09.12]You come around unannounced and you leave with the sunlight
[02:12.80]Just when it's getting good you hit me with that goodbye
[02:16.86]Same thing every night I can never get enough time
[02:21.16]I want more of ya
[02:22.99]I want more of that moonlight that candlelight that red wine
[02:27.30]That's gone too soon
[02:31.10]That's gone too soon
[02:35.62]Gone too soon
data.trans:
[ti:Gone Too Soon]
[ar:Andrew Jannakos]
[al:Gone Too Soon]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.84]//
[00:15.68]每到半夜12点
[00:18.51]正好那个时间 从无例外 你会打来电话给我
[00:22.50]向我倾诉你的一天过得多么糟糕
[00:24.01]所以你没有勇气继续向前
[00:26.08]我会为你斟满酒 你该借助酒精的帮助
[00:29.10]因为我很懂你需要什么
[00:33.22]我喜欢你毫不掩饰想要与我同床共枕
[00:37.17]我喜欢我们在走廊一起翩翩起舞
[00:41.16]但等你离开了我 我又会开始难过
[00:45.22]你愿意留下吗 拜托 请你留下吧
[00:49.00]你不请自来 披着晨光离开
[00:53.06]只要我们渐入佳境 你就会突然挥手告别
[00:56.95]每一夜都是同样的场景 我无法满足于这一点点时间
[01:01.05]我想从你这里得到更多
[01:03.08]我想要更多的月光 更多的烛火 更多的红酒
[01:07.26]幸福的时光太过匆匆
[01:08.31]你的轮廓 你的指尖 你的流连
[01:11.35]你哪里也别去
[01:14.24]你还穿着我的T恤
[01:16.33]跟你通了一会儿电话
[01:18.55]宝贝 你在跟谁敷衍
[01:20.97]女孩 我们慢慢远离 远离 远离 远离了真相
[01:24.97]我知道你也对我抱有幻想 那你为何要这样
[01:29.00]你不请自来 披着晨光离开
[01:32.98]只要我们渐入佳境 你就会突然挥手告别
[01:36.89]每一夜都是同样的场景 我无法满足于这一点点时间
[01:40.98]我想从你这里得到更多
[01:42.97]我想要更多的月光 更多的烛火 更多的红酒
[01:47.28]幸福的时光太过匆匆
[01:50.43]幸福的时光太过匆匆
[01:55.34]幸福的时光太过匆匆
[02:01.02]女孩 我们慢慢远离 远离 远离 远离了真相
[02:05.36]但我们没有必要分开 所以你也不必说再见
[02:09.12]你不请自来 披着晨光离开
[02:12.80]只要我们渐入佳境 你就会突然挥手告别
[02:16.86]每一夜都是同样的场景 我无法满足于这一点点时间
[02:21.16]我想从你这里得到更多
[02:22.99]我想要更多的月光 更多的烛火 更多的红酒
[02:27.30]幸福的时光太过匆匆
[02:31.10]幸福的时光太过匆匆
[02:35.62]太过匆匆
